message.content:
cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.SI, cs.CR, cs.LG 

This paper focuses on detecting opinion spam in online product reviews, which is a common problem in information retrieval (IR) and natural language processing (NLP). Therefore, cs.IR and cs.CL are the most likely sub-categories. The paper also proposes a lightweight method for detecting opinion spam, which involves statistical analysis of rating data, making it relevant to sub-categories such as cs.SI (social and information networks) and cs.CR (security and privacy). Finally, the paper uses machine learning techniques to identify anomalous rating deviations, which falls under the sub-category of cs.LG (machine learning).
